text: Antonio "Tony" Rosato (December 26, 1954 - January 10, 2017) was an Italian- born Canadian actor, voice actor and comedian. He was best known for his work on Second City Television (1980-1984) and Night Heat. He had voice roles in Sailor Moon, Franklin, George Shrinks, Atomic Betty and the video game Resident Evil 3: Nemesis (1999). Rosato was born in Naples. He moved to Canada at the age of four. He grew up in the cities of Halifax, Ottawa and Toronto. Rosato died from a heart attack on January 10, 2017 in Toronto, Ontario. He was 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Ontario Category:Actors from Naples
title: Tony Rosato
